tool_description: An API showing all the latest climate change updates all around the globe.
name: Climate Change Updates
title: Climate Change Updates

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news about climate change from a particular news source.

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change Updates
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate change all over the globe.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-updates3.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-updates3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-updates3.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-updates3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
